thread.title_full: BRIEF-Anoto and partner Objectif Lune receive order from Lewis Group Ltd.

title: BRIEF-Anoto and partner Objectif Lune receive order from Lewis Group Ltd.
text:
BRIEF-Anoto and partner Objectif Lune receive order from Lewis Group Ltd. Sept 11 
Sept 11 Anoto Group AB : 
* Anoto and partner Objectif Lune receive new order from Lewis Group Ltd. 
* Announces extension of contract of PlanetPress Capture and 1,500 digital pens with Lewis Group through its partner Objectif Lune 
Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
